thread.title: ADT to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference
thread.title_full: ADT to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference

title: ADT to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference
text:
ADT to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference September 24, 2015 04:30 PM Eastern Daylight Time 
BOCA RATON, Fla.--( BUSINESS WIRE )--The ADT Corporation (NYSE: ADT), a leading provider of security and automation solutions for homes and businesses, today announced that Senior Vice President and Treasurer Ravi Tulsyan will present at the 2015 Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference at approximately 2:15 p.m. MST (5:15 p.m. EDT) on Tuesday, September 29, 2015 at The Phoenician in Scottsdale, Arizona. 
The Company’s presentation materials will be available for download after 4:00 p.m. EDT September 29, 2015 via the investor relations section of ADT’s website at http://investors.adt.com . 
About ADT 
The ADT Corporation (NYSE: ADT) is a leading provider of security and automation solutions for homes and businesses in the United States and Canada. ADT's broad and pioneering set of products and services, including ADT Pulse® interactive home and business solutions, and health services, meet a range of customer needs for today’s active and increasingly mobile lifestyles. Headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, ADT helps provide peace of mind to nearly seven million customers, and it employs approximately 17,500 people at 200 locations. More information is available at www.adt.com . Contacts
